channel.title: Make the decision quick! Unlimited chest protection or Residence?
channel.description:
The poll really means nothing, and your vote is not going to count if you don't post your reasons.
The options are these:
1. keep the same plugins we have been using, and allow (virtually) unlimited chest protections. If you are found to be abusing chest protections, like making a house out of protected chests, then your ability to protect chests will be removed. 2. Ditch LWC and install the residence plugin, allowing you to protect a 64x64 area, and anything inside of it (including chests), you could also disable PVP in your zone if you wish.
This poll will run for 2 days, which will give me enough time to re-write the authentication code to work with the latest version of xAuth, then we should be good to upgrade to 1.7.
I'll refrain from posting my opinion for now.

item.title: Make the decision quick! Unlimited chest protection or Residence?
item.dc:creator: @Gamer1996 Gamer1996
item.description:
@Gamer1996 wrote:

Nok, they both have their problems which the staff already said will be dealt with where needed.

The majority of people chose “residence” and that seems to be what MITB is going with.

Matt, 1.7 without pistons is basically the ability to place leaves (shears) a rather pointless upgrade imo…

Read full topic
item.source: Make the decision quick! Unlimited chest protection or Residence?

item.title: Make the decision quick! Unlimited chest protection or Residence?
item.dc:creator: @Nokturth Nokturth
item.description:
@Nokturth wrote:

chests protection ftw, area protection will bring a lot of trouble, for example if someone else claims your actual land before you do.

Read full topic

item.title: Make the decision quick! Unlimited chest protection or Residence?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:132, topic:401995”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=499049.msg3656182#msg3656182 date=1310031314]

I’ll try to give this a shot tonight, I guess I’ll have to leave LWC in there for a few days so that currently protected chests stay protected during the change.
[/quote]How did that go?

Just an update, I’ve got everything working as it does now with 1.7.2, so we are just waiting on someone to release a duping fix.

edit:
Actually, what do you guys say to upgrading to 1.7.2, but disabling placing of any type of piston until the duping bug is fixed?

[quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=499049.msg3656253#msg3656253 date=1310040615]

What if we go on vacation for more than a week to some uncivilised place with no interwebs?

I guess you lose your protection probably, to be fair to everyone else.
[/quote]What’s fair about that?
Like now i’m fucked, i’m at my mom for a week and this computer can’t handle minecraft.
Can’t we like notify a mod or you and let you make the lease some longer?
Because now i will lose everything i own since i have no way of getting on, except if you let lwc on for 7 more days?

Yes, now that I looked at the mod that is a possibility, admins and maybe even mods should be able to renew your lease in extreme circumstances.[/quote]That would be great! Also is it a possibility to leave LWC on until 13 July?

Read full topic
item.source: Make the decision quick! Unlimited chest protection or Residence?

edit:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:131, topic:401995”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=499049.msg3655503#msg3655503 date=1309984489]

What if we go on vacation for more than a week to some uncivilised place with no interwebs?

I guess you lose your protection probably, to be fair to everyone else.
[/quote]What’s fair about that?
Like now i’m fucked, i’m at my mom for a week and this computer can’t handle minecraft.
Can’t we like notify a mod or you and let you make the lease some longer?
Because now i will lose everything i own since i have no way of getting on, except if you let lwc on for 7 more days?[/quote]

Yes, now that I looked at the mod that is a possibility, admins and maybe even mods should be able to renew your lease in extreme circumstances.

item.title: Make the decision quick! Unlimited chest protection or Residence?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:126, topic:401995”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=499049.msg3655710#msg3655710 date=1309997666]

It looks like I’ll probably be installing Residence, anyone care to tally the votes in the actual thread prior to when the poll closed?

I’ll try to give this a shot tonight, I guess I’ll have to leave LWC in there for a few days so that currently protected chests stay protected during the change.

so when somone trys to open a chest in a protected area will it say “you do not have permission to do this” like in old spawn? or liek when you break a protected block?

I don’t really know, even if it did let someone open chests in a protected area, if you put them under a block they couldn’t be opened.
[/quote]
Hey, some people don’t feel like going the extra 30 seconds.[/quote]

like me for example

Read full topic
